Articles.Content:
After weeks of development I've decided that my planet is in a state good enough to download, I have more planets planed in the future but for now it just includes Pan, a Laythelike ocean planet.

Big thanks to KillAshley and Thomas P for helping me develop it.

No pix, no clix, so:

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/h4ua3g8aaeklgdo/PanPlanetPack.zip?dl=0

(Remember to download kopernicus first: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114649 )

Future plans:

Blue moon of Pan

Oblate moon of Pan

Tiny moon on an eccentric orbit of Pan

Binary twin to Eeloo

Current Issues: ScaledSpace doesn't perfectly line up with the PQS

Licence: Creative Commons

Edited September 29, 2015 by timandy1

I'm gonna wait until more gets added. Looking forward to it!

- - - Updated - - -

I'm gonna wait until more gets added. Looking forward to it!
